channel.title: Wtf?
channel.description:
Ok so i started the server. It is online i checked with a server checker. Everything is portforwarded. I run my server and then i connect with the client. My friend who is on the same network as me tries to connect and it says: Connection Reset Client Null Disconnected
He did put my server ip in the gui.java file. How do i solve?

item.title: Wtf?
item.dc:creator: @death_t_d death t d
item.description:
@death_t_d wrote:

Ok so i started the server. It is online i checked with a server checker. Everything is portforwarded. I run my server and then i connect with the client. My friend who is on the same network as me tries to connect and it says:
Connection Reset
Client Null Disconnected

He did put my server ip in the gui.java file.
How do i solve?

Read full topic
